title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2018 Moonbits Series T 1k bits chips:#T2324 "12D938QT"#T2325 "1AYARsdr"#T2326 "1L5NZAuj"**Lot 1 will work on a LIFO system as seen in other auctions. Bid on the number of coin and then the amount per coin: 1 @ xxBTC, 2 @ xxBTC or 3 @ xxBTCLOT 2: 2014 CryptoImperator 10k bits "1LvEyDFP"LOT 3: 2015 Satori #013299 "1Kq35Yg2"STARTING BID PER COIN LOT 1: 0.0010BTCSTARTING BID LOT 2: 0.0100BTCSTARTING BID LOT 3: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 31st, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Kryptowerk

comments.body: Lot 2: 0.016Edit:lot 1: 2@ 0.005Just fyi: These are the first metal-alloy moonbits chips ever released. See: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0And on another note, (graded) moonbits just sold between $460 and $850 in these auctions: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OzoI6dKVce8  (8:12:30)(and these were the later released 0.001 BTC 2019 chips)WOW!
